paper_metadata.title: Mutational analysis of BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes in Peruvian families with hereditary breast and ovarian cancer
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant c.5946delT, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We identified c.5946delT in BRCA2 (BIC: 6174delT), a mutation which is known to be a founder mutation in Ashkenazi Jewish ancestry.

functional_data.summary: The c.5946delT mutation leads to a frameshift and is associated with breast cancer.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation was found in a patient diagnosed with breast cancer at age 40, and her paternal half-sister had bilateral breast cancer at age 34.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence based on family history and known pathogenicity.
variants.additional_notes: This variant is a known founder mutation in Ashkenazi Jewish populations.
key_quotes: We identified c.5946delT in BRCA2 (BIC: 6174delT), a mutation which is known to be a founder mutation in Ashkenazi Jewish ancestry.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for the BRCA2 variant was successfully extracted.
